turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, could you order a coffee for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on East Franklin Street in Chapel Hill?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sure. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's their medium? Is it the grande?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, it's a grande.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, then a grande. And an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and do you want anything else in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you have them use almond milk instead of regular milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, anything else? Any extra flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yeah, a pump of the mocha sauce in there would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, can do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get all that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, I have a grande caramel macchiato with an extra shot of espresso, almond milk, and a pump of the mocha sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, it's all ready! You can go pick it up soon! They'll send the receipt to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Bye!
